extracted_playbook.title: Check if Web UI Feature is Enabled
extracted_playbook.description: Verify if the web UI feature is enabled by checking for 'ip http server' and 'ip http secure-server' in the system configuration.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the web UI feature enabled?

extracted_playbook.title: Disable HTTP Server Feature
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the HTTP Server feature on all internet-facing systems to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan for Indicators of Compromise (IoCs)
extracted_playbook.description: Scan affected devices for the presence of IoCs by checking system logs for specific log messages and using the provided curl command to detect implants.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Affected Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Update affected devices with the latest fixed software releases available on the Cisco Software Download Center.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Affected Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Update affected devices with the latest fixed software releases available on the Cisco Software Download Center.

cve_id: Cisco IOS XE Software Web UI Vulnerability
affected_products: Cisco IOS XE Software with Web UI feature enabled
